Package modelServer.DAO.implementation

Class CoachDAO

java.lang.Object
modelServer.DAO.implementation.CoachDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICoachDAO
public class CoachDAO extends Object implements ICoachDAO
DAO Class accessing the database through an instance of the DBConnection class CoachDAO works with the operations connected to the Coach object.
